EmailTemplate.name: Not Interested.1 Not Interested
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners / {{lead.Full Name:default=edit me}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
We had a conversation some time ago regarding our services. As a courtesy I wanted to follow up and get an update from you.
We also are now publishing an Independent Consulting Brief. It's a monthly email that provides access to a convenient list of relevant resources, tools and best practices. You can sign up for it by going to http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief. Feel free to provide an update by simply replying to this email.
Regards,
{{lead.EM FName:default=Steve}} ___________________________________ {{lead.EM FName:default=Steve}} {{lead.EM LName:default=Arhancet}} Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: {{lead.EM Phone:default=703-793-6011}} f: 703-793-6070 e: {{lead.EM Email:default=SArhancet@mbopartners.com}} w: www.mbopartners.com
